file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-30-03-06 - MAIN DOOR - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN DOOR - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section the procedures to do the visual inspection of main door for general condition. B. Related Zone: 811. C. Zone Boundaries: STA X = 4514.0 thru STA X = 5292.0. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MAIN DOOR - EXTERNAL GENERAL VIS- ALL 05-30-03-200-801-A ♦ UAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-30-03 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-30-03-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAIN DOOR - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 52-Z811-213-001-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of main door , at zone 811 within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the internal general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300 LIGHT DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300 HEAVY DIRT - SERVICING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) If necessary, clean the inspection area (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300) or (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300) as applicable. J. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the main door for painting bad condition, loose rivets, skin deformation, rubber trim seal, sealant poor condition, scratches, gouges, creases, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, deformation, and deteriorated protective treatment.
